channel.title: The Sonic Infusion
channel.description:
Advancements in technology have sparked a fusion of new ideas and sounds. If you want to know the future of dance music, then stay tuned....Njoy the newest in Progressive, House, and Trance brought to you by Spencer Gordon. A Be sure to sign up to the mailing list to keep up to date on new announcements/shows!
Info: If you do not have an I-pod just right click and "save as" (or left click) on the link labeled "download" under each episode to save the Mp3 mix directly to your computer. If you do use Itunes or another similiar program use this link to subscribe :
http://spencergordon.podOmatic.com/rss2.xml
In Itunes go under the "advanced tab" and select "subscribe to a podcast". A window will pop up prompting for the above url.
Do you not know what folder Itunes is automatically downloading my podcasts to? Simply click on the "edit" menu and select preferences. On the pop-up box click on the advanced tab and it will tell you there!!!
Note: This is a non-profit site meant soley to promote the artist's and their work it contains.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Njoy the beatz!
channel.itunes:author: spencer gordon

item.title: Groove Cruise DJ Contest 2011
item.description: Vote for me to win a trip to play on THE GROOVE CRUISE!!! You can vote once per day until December 8th!! Use this link: http://thegroovecruise.strutta.com/entries/91063?=f124dw Just use the stars and give me a 5 star vote!!! 1. Lange - Harmonic Motion(Marcus Schossow Trouse Remix) 2. Ronski Speed - B Sign (Original Mix) 3. Nadia Ali - Give it up (Niklas Gustavsson extended Mix) 4. Martin Roth vs Blank & Jone - KooKoo (Session 2) 5. Faithless ft. Dido - Feelin Good (Ferry Corsten's Fix) 6. Moguai - Catch 8001 (Spencer Gordon's Acapella Remix) 7. Martin Solveig & Dragonette - Hello (Michael Woods Dub Remix) 8. Nadia Ali - Rapture (Avicii new generation extended mix) 9. Underworld - Always Loved A Film (Michael Woods Remix) 10. Jerome Isma-Ae & Paul Thomas vs Wezz Devall - Tomorrow vs Emo Dist(Spencer Gordon Mashup) 11. Chicane - Where Do I Start (Armin Van Buuren Remix)
